c.w: This story is 18+ and not suitable for Minors. Do not read if you are under the age of 18.

n.t: >> First Look Into New Website Design (02AUG2025)
n.c:
Hello Site Visitor! Welcome to the new CS Paint Adventures website!

Since the creation of it; The index page was always a little lack luster. I've changed it majorly once, but never touched it after that, until NOW!

Now that I have the outlet; Allow me to [u]announce a few things:[/u]

[b]>>[/b] This website is made with the helping hand of [b]Grant Gryczan[/b], owner of MSPFA and creator of FileGarden (Of which all images you see is hosted on)

Without his helpful contribution, none of this would exist in the timely manner in which it is now. He has taught me alot about coding (and still does because im genuinely stupid).

Other contributors is [b]Seymour Schlong[/b], Creator of tools such as [background=#007e9e][url='splashtagmaker.com']Splashtag Maker[/url][/background] and other various projects posted on his [background=#007e9e][url='https://bsky.app/profile/did:plc:u6d3d2a3bvfbtd2qmxafmw37']BlueSky[/url][/background]

[b]>> [u]NEW STORY ADDDED:[/u] [color=#ff0059]Hearts & Minds[/color][/b] - By Opsenheimer

'A story focusing on two European adults who decide to play an online game with their other friends. Both strange to the world and eachother, will they be able to connect with others to overcome the dangers ahead?

A Fan Adventure focusing on action, adventure and relationships.'

[b]>>[/b] I will soon be implimenting an anonymous comment system, similar to the likes of 4chan. I plan in the further future to make a board like page within CSPA that will allow general homestuck talk as well. Due to the high restrictions of discussing Homestuck on /co/.

Thats all I have to say for now!

- Moonrunes

Hear Ye! Hear Ye!

New adventures; Drinking Problem & Homestuck Italiano â€” Have been added to the ever growing roster of MSPFA's mirrored in CSPA! Thank you Abies and Alighieri for your wondeful contribution to the website!

Please give them a read and support them on MSPFA as well!

In other news; I am still working on the website, albeit slowly, and I am still working on the comment section mainly for readers! Please bear with me during this very hard coding process.

- Moonrunes
